title: Akash Ansari
text: Welcome to my blog! I am a biostatistician with a keen interest in statistics, deep learning, and programming. This blog is a chronicle of my personal and professional journey as I explore these fascinating fields.

title: matplotlib demo
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure 1.


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()





Figure 1: A line plot on a polar axis
